value:
You trying to pick a fight? Come on,
don't back down now. It's just a test
of strength. No one has to die.

I only swing my sword for Lady Rhea.
Not that I can imagine her having
many enemies in this world...

You look tired. Make sure you're
getting enough sleep between training.

I hear you're no use with weapons?
That's disappointing. I was hoping we
could spar.

Weapon maintenance is important.
Thunderbrand's blade never chips,
but the hilt will be ruined if I ignore it.

There are so many Heroes here. It
fuels my drive... Oh, right! Greetings
from $Nf!

There's no one who can stop
my progress!

As long as you keep fighting, you'll
get stronger, even if that wasn't
your intention.

Even I have times where I don't grow
as much as I had hoped.

I always welcome opportunities to
learn and grow!

The name's Catherineâ€”I'm a Knight
of Seiros and servant of the goddess.
Want to taste my blade?

Of all the things I've experienced in
this world, I only have one regret: not
being able to fight you!$k$pI find you and your leadership style
fascinating, but I'll never be able to
know how you operate in combat.$k$pWell, no sense dwelling on it. I'll just
have to change my frame of mind.
Still, it really is too bad.$k$pAt least I can still see some action on
the battlefield. I'll have to settle for
celebrating victories with you instead!$k$pFrom now on, I'll wield the Hero's
Relic Thunderbrand for you!
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
(exertion)
Stay down!
Where do I start?
Out of my sight!
Here it comes!
If I die here...
Ahaha!
Relax. If nobody's dying, it's not worth getting worked up over.
Don't sneak up on me like that. I almost cut you down. It's a reflex.
Despite what you may think, I was actually born to a noble line. I even bear their Crest.
These hands can brawl with the best of them, but don't ask me to pick a lock or thread a needle.
The Knights of Seiros are sometimes called the shining knights. We're the sword and shield of the divine Seiros.
The sword may be my focus, but I'm good even without a weapon. You'll never catch me with my guard down.
Give me the toughest opponents you can find. For you, I'll take on any challenge.
I'll crush them all.
Don't overdo it.
This way.
